snippet: President Obama signs a “fair pay” order. How a former waitress at Denny’s amassed an empire of Denny’s locations. A high-tech way to smuggle marijuana.
abstract: President Obama signs a “fair pay” order. How a former waitress at Denny’s amassed an empire of Denny’s locations. A high-tech way to smuggle marijuana.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Are Employees 'Champions'?
